Package suncertify.db

Interface Summary
DBMain DBMain consists of basic low-level CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations allowing users to perform operations on database - it also allows user to lock/unlock concrete record in the database.
DBPersistent<T extends Persistent> DBPersistent provides additional methods to the main db interface - DBMain - that can operate on persistent domain objects (see Persistent) rather than String arrays.
 

Class Summary
Data Data is an implementation of DBMain class.
 

Exception Summary
DBException DBException is thrown when a general database failure occurs and it is also base class for all specific exceptions that can occur during processing any operation on database.
DuplicateKeyException DuplicateKeyException is thrown while attempting to add or modify database record whoose data are not unique.
RecordNotFoundException RecordNotFoundException is thrown while attempting to process (any CRUD operation) record that does not exist in database.
